alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the City of Franklin and the southwestern City of Suffolk through 700 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Franklin, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rainfall could result in localized ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Courtland, Holland, Suffolk, Hunterdale, Whaleyville, Carrsville, Handsom, Lummis, Cleopus, Somerton, Sunbeam, Lees Mill, Elwood and Story. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
